title: Braum's Theme Composer
body: Hello, I was just wondering who is the composer of Braum's Theme, because I'm transcribing the partiture and making a viol√≠n cover, but also I wanna give credits to the original creator, thanks for reading c:

replies.body: That sounds lovely! Braum's theme was written by the super awesome ChemicalSeb (Sebastien Najand)!
Thank you so much for the reply, I'll share the finished work as soon as I can, have a nice day and say hello to Sebastien for me c:

Please do, we love seeing what you crazy (talented) cats come up with! <3 

Will do, I'll drop him the link :D

Hi The Yordle o3o!

Thanks so much! :)  Super excited to hear your violin cover!! :D

Hi, I just finished the cover, I'll drop the link so you can see the result if you want, thank you so much for your music, It gives a totally new perspective to the world of Runaterra c:{{champion:201}} 

https://youtu.be/XeKj1HZnCaU
